title: Will these specs be enough to run lol at max settings?
body:
Hello summoners.

I've  been playing league on 50 fps max from the start, and now im getting a new comp.I have collected parts, i was wondering will this specs be enough to get 100plus fps with atleast high/veryhigh settings.

These are specs i am getting:

Intel(r) core(tm) i5-3470s cpu @ 2.90ghz , Max Turbo Frequency	3.60 GHz
Nvidia GEforce GTX 750 TI
16 GB Ram
HDD 1,500 GB
motherboard h61 M.K

What do you guys think about this, let me know. Thanks !

replies.body: PCs are a unique thing, and it wouldn't be fair to set expectations on a rig I haven't had hands-on time with.  Instead, I suggest using our [recommended system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide to help you make the best decision fit for you.  Hope that helps!
